StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateHSCCPro.le]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolPro.leID uniqueiden..er, @XmlResp xml
AS BEGIN -- STEP 1: Start the transac.on BEGIN TRANSACTION update MCRISS.DBO.High_School_Pro.le set XML_RESPONSE = @XmlResp
IF (@@ERROR <> 0) GOTO ErrorHandler
COMMIT TRANSACTION
ErrorHandler: -- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
END
